short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is an extension to look up prices of CS2 Skins

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The CS2 Skin Price Checker is an extension that allows users to Fetch the latest Steam Prices for multiple variants of a desired skin. Uses Steam's API to fetch prices.
